bug.author: greatscots
bug.summary: Not all Environments connecting when running multiple concurrent training sessions.
bug.description:
When starting multiple concurrent training sessions (e.g. --num-runs=6), some Unity Instances are unable to connect to python. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8713282/45423763-8c4be800-b694-11e8-8178-d571461dfdb9.jpg></denchmark-link>
As seen in the image, Assembly-0 and Assembly-1 are not connected and give no results. Using time.sleep(5) after starting a new process in learn.py helped.
